name: afirgen-frontend
description: AFIRGen Frontend - Static HTML/CSS/JS application for FIR generation system

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:css: cssnano css/main.css dist/css/main.min.css && cssnano css/themes.css dist/css/themes.min.css && cssnano css/glassmorphism.css dist/css/glassmorphism.min.css
scripts.build:js: terser js/app.js js/api.js js/validation.js js/security.js js/ui.js js/keyboard-navigation.js js/config.js --config-file terser.config.json -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:html: html-minifier --config-file .htmlminifierrc.json -o dist/index.html index.html && html-minifier --config-file .htmlminifierrc.json -o dist/offline.html offline.html
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist/lib dist/assets && cp -r lib/. dist/lib/ && if [ -d assets ]; then cp -r assets/. dist/assets/; fi && cp -f sw.js dist/sw.js
scripts.verify:sizes: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function getSize(dir,ext){let total=0;function walk(d){fs.readdirSync(d).forEach(f=>{const p=path.join(d,f);if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory())walk(p);else if(p.endsWith(ext))total+=fs.statSync(p).size});};walk(dir);return total;}const css=getSize('dist/css','.css');const js=getSize('dist/js','.js');const lib=getSize('dist/lib','.js');const html=getSize('dist','.html');const total=css+js+lib+html;console.log('CSS:',(css/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');console.log('App JS:',(js/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');console.log('Lib JS:',(lib/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');console.log('HTML:',(html/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');console.log('Total:',(total/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');console.log('Est. gzipped:',(total*0.3/1024).toFixed(2),'KB');"
scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p dist dist/css dist/js dist/lib dist/assets

author: AFIRGen Team
